official_title: A bill entitled: The Mass Transit Improvement Act of 1986.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to eliminate as a condition of Federal financial assistance to State and local public mass transit agencies the retention of certain employee protective arrangements including: (1) collective bargaining rights; (2) pension rights; (3) certain assurances of employment and reemployment; and (4) paid training or retraining programs.

titles.title: A bill entitled: The Mass Transit Improvement Act of 1986.
